title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 134.11 - Program participation renewal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 134.11 - Program participation renewal

State Regulations
(a) A currently qualified program participant
may apply to renew her or his program certification. A renewal notice shall be
sent to the program participant at least 30 days before the expiration of the
current authorization. (b) If the
program determines that the program participant is eligible to participate in
the program, he or she shall certify the participant for an additional
four-year term and issue a new identification card. The program participant
shall return his or her expired identification card to the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
134.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
